<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs=""
>
[Shrinking Potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=197)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 564 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Onset** 1 minute

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This fungus-flavored potion conveys the effects of the [_shrink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=284) spell to make you and all your gear smaller. After the onset, you remain small for 10 minutes. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"
right="Item 4"

>
Shrinking Potion
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 564 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Shrinking Potion (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 564 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This potion has no onset, lasts for 1 hour, and grants the effects of a 4th-level _shrink_ spell. In addition, you gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while shrunken.
